metadata.title: RA Family: What type of microphone interfaces are used ?

sections.content:
Question:
What type of microphone interfaces are used ?
Answer:
Digital microphones on VOICE kits use the I2S emulated interface.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
